Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I understand its value to you stands at $8,000. To ensure we both reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I propose a price of $10,000 for this product. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and a dedicated support package to ensure you have all the assistance needed to maximize its benefits. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
